mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_quartz_run_history (id, quartz_id, state, start_time, end_time, start_type, start_user_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{quartzId}, #{state}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{startType}, #{startUserId})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.state, CONVERT(a.start_time, char) startTime, CONVERT(a.end_time, char) endTime, a.start_type startType, CASE a.start_type WHEN 1 THEN '自动启动' WHEN 2 THEN '人工启动' ELSE '' END startTypeName, CONCAT_WS('_', b.job_number, b.user_name) startUserName FROM sys_quartz_run_history a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON a.start_user_id = b.user_id WHERE a.quartz_id = #{quartzId} ORDER BY a.start_time DESC
SELECT a.id, a.state, a.quartz_id quartzId, CONVERT(a.start_time, char) startTime, CONVERT(a.end_time, char) endTime, a.start_type startType FROM sys_quartz_run_history a WHERE a.id = #{id}
